name: Buff Pack Run Cap - Unisex
description: Lightweight and packable, this running hat folds down small to fit in your running pack or pocket. The breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps your head cool during high-output activities.Made of ultralight polyester and elastane that wicks sweat away from your head.Packable design folds down into tiny ball.Soft polyurethane visor maintains its shape even after packing.Adjustable drawstring fits most heads.
